column4: ok, I know a file exists, but when I goto places -> search for files. Select file system as folder, it doesn't find the file. WHY?
is the search not recursive? because that's just dumb
case sensitivity? the tracker hasn't updated the index yet and the file new? the search doesn't work the way you think it does
what is the name of the file you're looking for?... I don't speak windows.. sorry
